attributes.action: stop british waterways putting their boat mooring up for tender
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to bring to pm attention british waterways new policy on accepting tenders for their vacant boat moorings which will go to the highest bidder. thus making pleasure boating an impossible pastime for the average working man to achieve & allowing the rich to jump the waiting lists already in place

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop british waterways putting their boat mooring up for tender."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15825.asp

Prime Minister's Office
